module.name: Catalog
module.description: With the Catalog module it is possible to show products (i.e. clothing, bicycles or whatever) on your website. Your visitors can view, discuss and order (for now without paying methods) products. A few features of this module: * comment on products * put products in shopping cart (based on cookies) * order products (without paying methods) * add products in categories and subcategories * add dynamic specifications * add images, files and videos to a product
